        Parameters:
        aTimeStepNumber - Number of time steps
        aTimeStepLength - Time step length
        aTimeStepFrequencyForOutput - Time step frequency for output
        anInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationStepNumber - Number of initial potential energy minimization steps
        anIsInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationStepOutput - Flag for initial potential energy minimization step output
        aPeriodicBoundaries - Periodic boundaries
        anIsDpdUnitMass - Flag for use of DPD unit masses
        aNumberOfInitialVelocityScalingSteps - Number of initial velocity scaling steps

      • isInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationStepOutput

        public boolean isInitialPotentialEnergyMinimizationStepOutput()
        Flag for initial potential energy minimization step output.
        Returns:
        True: Potential energy minimization step output is generated, false: Otherwise (NO output)

      • getPeriodicBoundaries

        public PeriodicBoundaries getPeriodicBoundaries()
        Periodic boundaries
        Returns:
        Periodic boundaries

      • isDpdUnitMass

        public boolean isDpdUnitMass()
        Flag for use of DPD unit masses: True : DPD masses of all particles are set to 1 False: The DPD mass of the most lightweight particle (often water) is set to 1. The masses of all other particles are set in relation to their molar mass ratios to the most lightweight particle.
        Returns:
        Flag for use of DPD unit masses

      • getNumberOfInitialVelocityScalingSteps

        public int getNumberOfInitialVelocityScalingSteps()
        Number of initial velocity scaling steps
        Returns:
        Number of initial velocity scaling steps
